title: Elegant-Prime Location-High-End & Contemporary Remodel
posting_body: ['2BR / 1Ba 1590ft2', '.', '$4,990/mth lease street/public parking option,', '.', '$5,290/mth lease with parking convenient option,', 'Do you want to live in a « shoe box » or in a beautiful, very spacious, comfortable, remodeled Art Deco unit you can call home at a lower cost?', 'Want to live well, happy, refreshed in a very nice quiet unit?', 'Contact us!', 'Want to take care of our nest the same way we do?', 'We would love to hear about you.', 'Contact us!', 'Flat - Description:', '.', 'Great value,', '.', 'Prime location, Elegance, design, spacious, describe this fab condo located in a beautiful Beaux-Arts elevator bldg.,', '.', 'Rear quiet unit with view of a wonderful private square w/modern upgrades, exquisite details, remodeled modern kitchen-granite ctrs., Italian cherry cab.', ', Carrera marble floors, top of the line appliances (Bosh, Viking…),', '.', 'Formal spacious dining rm.', 'w/coved ceiling, spacious formal.', 'liv.', 'rm., hardwood floors, coffered high ceil, and crown molding,', '.', 'Custom design/remodeled bathroom w/heated floor, shower/tub with high-end Hansgrohe faucet,', '.', 'Spacious private bedrooms with large windows, unique customized cabinets and shelves,', 'Top Of The Line Remodel:', '.', 'High-end Italian lighting,', '.', 'High-end appliances,', '.', 'High-end faucets,', '.', 'High-end bathroom remodel,', '.', 'Bose surround sound system,', '.', 'Heated bathroom floor,', '.', 'In-home washer/dryer,', '.', 'Verdant outlooks (garden great view),', '.', 'Urban living at its best,', '.', 'Quiet unit,', 'Building - Description:', '.', 'Beautiful 12 unit boutique Beaux-Arts elevator building, with a perfect 100 Walk Score,', '.', 'Most walkable location, just steps from Union Square, BART, world-class shopping, luxurious hotels, landmarks, and the best of SF dining and entertainment, you have it all,', '.', 'Whether by foot, car, or transit, your commute to the Financial District or anywhere else in the city, East Bay, South Bay, SFO has never been easier,', 'Prime location - Awesome Street:', '.', 'Beautiful Powell St. between Bush and Pine,', 'Additional Details:', '.', 'Great view of a quiet and private park,', '.', 'Unique and rare feel of tranquility right in the heart of the city,', '.', 'Unit with great positive energy and full of natural light,', '.', 'Great layout and private master bedroom with no vis-à-vis,', '.', 'Elevator available,', '.', 'Intercom,', '.', 'Extra laundry room available,', '.', 'On and off-street parking options available,', '.', 'Unit freshly repainted,', 'Rental -
